title: michaelgummere.com
description: Personal website created using React, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS. I created this website to showcase my projects and skills.

title: Hammer
description: Simple chat application created as a way to learn websockets, TypeScript, and React. Server is written in TypeScript and uses Express for routing. Client is written in JavaScript and uses React for the frontend, while the API library is written in TypeScript. Uses WebSockets for all communication. I personally wrote all the code for the entire stack, authentication, socket, etc.

title: VEX Robotics Competition
description: I was a member of the Steel Eagles Robotics (7701) club when I was in high school. We competed in the VEX Robotics Competition. I filled the role o programmer and designer. My team worked hard in the incredibly difficult Indiana region and managed to qualify for the State Championship in 2023 and fell just short of qualifying for the World Championship.

title: Katana
description: Prototype datastore that takes in strings as arrays, stored in a json file.

title: firefox-discord
description: Firefox/Chrome extension that displays the currently viewed website in Discord.

title: SmoreSoftware
description: I was the founder/member of a small software development team that created Discord bots for a variety of purposes.
